price: (25) Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhābun ashirun
